EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #13.2018 Dealer Update #13
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | July 2018
SmartRunway/SmartLanding 50% off Promotion
- This sales bulletin announces a special promotional price for SmartRunway/SmartLanding that expires at the end of 2018. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-01 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-01 Rev B SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
